Package org.mongounit

Class MongoUnitExtension

java.lang.Object
org.mongounit.MongoUnitExtension
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterAllCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterEachCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeAllCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeEachCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.Extension
public class MongoUnitExtension extends Object implements org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeAllCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeEachCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterEachCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterAllCallback
MongoUnitExtension class is a JUnit 5 extension which enables the MongoUnit framework features in a test target.

  • Field Details

    • CURRENT_MONGO_DATABASE

      public static com.mongodb.client.MongoDatabase CURRENT_MONGO_DATABASE
      Reference to the current Mongo database. This is for sharing with the MongoUnit static methods only and not a substitute for the ExtensionContext.Store-based sharing model.
